summary: This document is a search and seizure warrant issued by the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York. It authorizes law enforcement to search specified property and seize items related to violations of federal law, specifically Title 18, United States Code, Sections 371 and 1591. The warrant includes provisions for execution and notification requirements.

persons.name: Amy Pitman
persons.context: Amy Pitman is the magistrate judge who authorized the search warrant.

events.title: Search and Seizure Warrant Execution
events.description: A search and seizure warrant was issued to search specified property related to federal law violations.

keyFacts: The search warrant was issued for property believed to be connected to violations of federal law.
The warrant allows for execution during the daytime hours.
Immediate notification of the warrant's execution may be delayed to prevent adverse effects on the trial.
